distance_factor.title: Distance factor
distance_factor.description: Multiplicand applied to euclidean distance to approximate a travelling distance

walking_speed.title: Walking speed [meters/seconds]
walking_speed.description: Walking speed of Person objects, used when walking speed cannot be fetched from topology

geojson_format.title: GeoJSON output format
geojson_format.description: Filename format of the GeoJSON output. Placeholder: {scenario}

kpi_format.title: KPI output format
kpi_format.description: Filename format of the KPI output. Placeholders: {scenario}, {kpi_output}

traces_format.title: Traces output format
traces_format.description: Filename format of the traces output. Placeholder: {scenario}

max_stop_distance.title: Max stop distance [meters]
max_stop_distance.description: Maximum accepted distance between stop and node before extending graph (when extend_graph_from_stops is True)

transfer_restriction.title: Transfer time restriction [seconds]
transfer_restriction.description: Duration restriction applied to the GTFS transfer table before making it transitively closed

estimated_detour.title: Estimated trip detour
estimated_detour.description: Used in some models to estimate a shared trip duration before proper planning. Multiplied to the trip direct travel time

geojson_version.title: GeoJSON output version
geojson_version.description: Format version of the GeoJSON output. If null, use the one specified in geojson_output.py.

stop_sequence_separator.title: Stop sequence separator
stop_sequence_separator.description: Separator used to build stop sequences in GTFS
